name: 吳俊傑
objective:
色度學是光學理論中的一部分，討論色彩的問題。
從基本光度學、人眼視覺等原理，到表色體系與色度量測與計算之相關公式，
再到CIE表色系統的發展。最後介紹色度學在工業界應用上所扮演的角色。
schedule:
01~02 週：Chapter 1 Light, vision and photometry
03~04 週：Chapter 2 Color vision and color specification systems
05~06 週：Chapter 3 CIE standard colorimetric system
07~08 週：Chapter 4 Uniform color spaces
09       週：期中考
10~11 週：Measurement and calculation of colorimetric
12~14 週：Evolution of CIE standard colorimetric system
15~17 週：Application of CIE standard colorimetric system
18       週：期末考
materials:
Text book:
Noboru Ohta and Alan R. Robertson, "Colorimetry fundamentals and applications,"
John Wiley & Sons, Ltd
